Class: HLFTxEventHandler

(protected) HLFTxEventHandler(eventHubs, txId, timeout, requiredEventHubs)

Class representing a connection to a business network running on Hyperledger
Fabric, using the hfc module.

Constructor

(protected) new HLFTxEventHandler(eventHubs, txId, timeout, requiredEventHubs)

Construct a Tx Event Handler.

Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
eventHubs Array.<EventHub>

the event hubs to listen for tx events
txId String

the txid that is driving the events to occur
timeout Integer

how long (in seconds) to wait for events to occur.
requiredEventHubs Integer 1

number of required event hubs, either 0 or 1, default to 0
for old composer be
